name: Force10 | FTOS | Security | Authentication | SNMP Authentication Failure (SNMP)

patterns.value_re: ^SNMP_AUTH_FAIL: SNMP Authentication failure for SNMP request from host (?P<ip>\S+)$

name: Force10 | FTOS | Security | Authentication | Login (SYSLOG)
description: %SEC-5-LOGIN_SUCCESS: Login successful for user noc-sa on line vty0 \(10\.10\.114\.17\)

patterns.value_re: %SEC-5-LOGIN_SUCCESS: Login successful for user (?P<user>.+) on line \S+ \((?P<ip>\S+)\)$

name: Force10 | FTOS | Security | Authentication | Logout (SYSLOG)
description: %SEC-5-LOGOUT: Exec session is terminated for user noc-sa on line vty0 (10.12.114.17)

patterns.value_re: %SEC-5-LOGOUT: Exec session is terminated for user (?P<user>.+) on line \S+ \((?P<ip>\S+)\)$
